amendment.description: To broaden the purpose for which certain funds for rural housing may be used.

vote.text: Amendment SA 243 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 243 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Edwards. (consideration: CR S1433-1438; text: CR S1434-1435) To broaden the purpose for which certain funds for rural housing may be used.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 243 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 243 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Edwards.
